input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter use to handle the request.
Default value: AmazonEC2RESTActorAdapter
access key [Optional] The AWS access key.
secret key [Optional] The AWS secret access key.

session token [Optional] : The AWS session token which is generally created for temporary access to users for role based authorization.
Please Note: The temporary access key , secret key and session token to be generated by the user to provide in adapter request.
Please refer below AWS docs for more details
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_credentials_temp_request.html
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/reference/sts/assume-role.html
region [Optional] The region to communicate with.

public ips set [Optional]
Set of elastic IP addresses, in XML structure as below:
<public-ips-set> <!--Zero or more repetition--> <item> <public-ip></public-ip> </item> </public-ips-set>

allocation ids set [Optional]
Set of allocation ids of the elastic IP addresses to describe, in XML structure as below:
<allocation-id-set> <!--Zero or more repetition--> <item> <allocation-id></allocation-id> </item> </allocation-id-set>

filter set [Optional]
The details of the filters per which you want to retrieve the elastic IP addresses.
<filter-set> <!--Zero or more repetition--> <item> <name>domain</name> <value-set> <!--Zero or more repetition--> <item> <value>standard</value> </item> </value-set> </item> </filter-set>
The following are the available filters.
domain (Type: String) Indicates whether the address is for use in a VPC. Valid values: standard | vpc
instance-id (Type: String) The instance the address is associated with (if any).
public-ip (Type: String) The Elastic IP address.
allocation-id (Type: String) The allocation ID for the address (VPC only).
association-id (Type: String) The association ID for the address (VPC only).
network-interface-id (Type: String) The network interface (if any) that the address is associated with (VPC only).
network-interface-owner-id (Type: String) The owner IID.
private-ip-address (Type: String) The private IP address associated with the Elastic IP address (VPC only).

output.description: The adapter response containing the results.

documentation.description: Lists elastic IP addresses assigned to your account or provides information about a specific address.
